eventName: Such is the Joy of Our Reunion
storyInfo: Blaze and Xingzhu finally know each other's histories. Determined to seek an explanation for everyone's sake, Blaze plans to confront the True Lung. Meanwhile, with his delivery box in hand, Young Chef gets ready to meet a very special customer.

attributes.content: Yu Cheng... That is the truth behind the Grand Preceptor case you seek.
attributes.name: Ning Shu

attributes.content: Do you have any further questions?
attributes.name: Ning Shu

attributes.content: You've spoken at length, yet you've said nothing about your role in these events, Mr. Ning.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: Why did you send someone to kill the Minister of Justice?
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: Do you not already have the answer, Deputy Minister Yu? Was it not you who accused me years ago of having the Minister murdered to stop him from investigating and save myself in the chaos?
attributes.name: Ning Shu

attributes.content: You need not be in such a hurry to discredit yourself.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: There was one question that perplexed me for a long time. Why did Gu Quan stay at your house when he returned to Baizao nearly a decade later?
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: It was not until I saw that girl at your house did all the puzzle pieces fall into place.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: He narrowly escaped with his life, yet he still returned to Baizao, not only to find the truth of what happened, but also to search for the daughter he left behind.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: It seems he did not tell you much.
attributes.name: Ning Shu

attributes.content: Yes. Most of what follows will be mere speculation. If I'm wrong, feel free to laugh in my face.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: I heard that after the Grand Preceptor's suicide following accusations of treason, the entire nation was in uproar and mandarins distanced themselves from her. Yet, one Academy student dared to honor her in public.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: It was thus that he stumbled onto the Grand Preceptor's home as the belongings within were being confiscated. In his hurry, all he could take away was a baby girl, just born into the family. As it so happened, his own daughter was recently born as well.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: At his wit's end, he tried to flee Baizao with his wife and the two babies. As a scholar with no background, he didn't get far before an Imperial Guard captured him.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: Perhaps out of compassion and wanting to keep the Grand Preceptor's bloodline going, the Imperial Guard spared the scholar and the Grand Preceptor's child, instead taking the scholar's daughter.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: I do not know what Gu Quan was thinking at the time, but it was most likely he had no other choice.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: This child fell into the hands of the Minister of Justice, her bloodline obvious with a modicum of research. But as it turned out, how to handle this child of an outsider was a delicate conundrum indeed.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: It was around this time that you, Mr. Ning, long dissatisfied with the Minister's extreme methods, decided to take the ultimate risk: assassination.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: The Grand Preceptor's case implicated many, and it seemed fitting that the bloodstained Minister of Justice met his end through retribution. With the court's turmoil resolved, the True Lung allowed the bloodstained curtain to finally fall in this fashion.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: The only unresolved question left is that child. Based on how things are now, she was taken into your care. What this entailed is not hard to guess. But as for the why of it...
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: If I recall correctly, Mr. Ning, you enjoyed the tutelage of the Grand Preceptor as well, correct?
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: O Yu Cheng, had you not been absorbed in Judicial work or confined to this cell, I shudder to think what that meticulous mind of yours might have accomplished.
attributes.name: Ning Shu

attributes.content: It's terrifying, truly terrifying.
attributes.name: Ning Shu

attributes.content: You flatter me. I'm nothing more than a fool compared to Gu Quan. It is simply because I have met far too many people in my capacity as Deputy Minister of the Judicial Review Office. The more one sees, the more one learns.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: Now that I think about it, the dish Gu Quan offered to the True Lung at the Feast of a Hundred Delicacies wasn't merely an act of suicide—it was him reconciling with the truth.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: Before he passed, he did not tell me the truth, but he did divulge the whereabouts of the Grand Preceptor's orphan. He must have hoped that once I found the truth for myself, I would also choose reconciliation.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: Yet I could not.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: All I could do was use my methods to find the people still left, the ones you care for, and force you to spit out the truth.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: All things considered, Mr. Ning, you are no villain, perhaps just a coward...
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: Hate me all you want.
attributes.name: Yu Cheng

attributes.content: To see that child once more has always been a wish of mine...
attributes.name: Ning Shu

attributes.content: I will go and seek an audience with His Majesty.
attributes.name: Ning Shu

attributes.content: You... You know everything?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I only just found out...
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: I still want to ask you—
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: How are you... so calm about all this...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It was a suspicion I hid away in my heart for many, many years... One I have finally found proof for.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Like a thorn stuck in your palm. It may bleed a bit when you pluck it out, but you'll feel much better afterward.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Why...
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Why won't you say something?
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: I don't know how it came to all this...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Should I feel sad or angry right now...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I don't know... All I know is that my mind's a mess and my heart feels like it's being stabbed... Who the hell am I supposed to set ablaze with this fire crawling up my throat?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Well, I have a question for you.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Blaze... Can you tell me about Gu Quan? My... my father. What sort of man was he?
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: He... He was an idiot, a nerd, and a liar!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I hate lies! I've seen too damn many of them! Greedy lies, cowardly lies, sneaky lies...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But never one that demanded a lifetime of commitment, one that cost him his own daughter and himself, all to protect someone who had nothing to do with him.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: How... How could he be so stupid?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It reminds me of a story I once read...
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: There once was a guard who watched over a rest station by the river. One day, he saw a flood coming from upstream. He wanted to run upstream and tell the people there to close the sluice gates.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: But he had only run halfway when he saw the river was rising too quickly. It was too late to close the gates. So he immediately decided to turn and warn the villagers downstream to flee.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Back and forth he ran, until finally he was consumed and swept away by the flood. He didn't manage to do anything or save anyone.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Get to the point already...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Would you... Would you say this man's deeds sound familiar?
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Fine, I get it! Well, I don't really get all the details of your windy-ass story, but you're talking shit about him, aren't you?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: He wasn't a bad guy, okay?! He was just... Urgh!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I know you've got good reasons to blame him, duh, but if he was the one who threw you away, why would he spend so much time coming back to look for you—
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I thought I would be the one consoling you, not the other way around...
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Blaze... You're infected, right?
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Wait, when did you figure that out—
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Man, you're too... you're too damn clever by half!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Sorry, I didn't mean anything untoward... I was just thinking that it really should have been my fate to be...
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: The hell are you even talking about?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What? You think you've done something wrong and deserve a worse fate?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Please, my life is awesome. I've got lots of buddies, and I've found a dream of mine...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: If anything, you're the one who got it bad! Growing up all by yourself in that big old mansion, alone and miserable.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It almost sounds like you're roasting me...
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: I'm not—
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But I understand... I understand what you mean.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Oh, right... I still haven't asked you what your name actually is.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Zhuhuang... Gu Zhuhuang. It's the name Dad... he gave me.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Wow... I forget how long it's been since I last told someone my real name.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Well, that's it. That's the last of my secrets.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: 'A blazing candle to ward against the dark'... Zhu for a candle, Huang for a blaze, and the family name Gu to ward you. It really does sound like a name he would pick.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Blaze... Would you say I've only really gotten to know you now, after all this?
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: I... I guess so, yeah.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Wait, no, I've still got lots to tell you, and I need to bring you to Victoria to have a look around. My mom—err, or rather... your birth mother. You should probably go see her...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...She's still alive?
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Who said she was dead?! She's still hale and hearty! She lives in a small town out in western Victoria.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Once everything's wrapped up here, I'll take you to her.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Sh-She definitely wants to see you...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: A-Alright...
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Why're you crying?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I-I'm not...
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: But you... You're the one who's about to break into tears any second now...
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: I'm just... happy.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I never thought I'd suddenly find myself a little sister after all these years.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Who's ever heard of sisters like us...?
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: And besides, we don't know yet who's the little one.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: I've been through a lot today. Can't you let me have this one?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: And there you were, consoling me...
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Look, I just wanted to say...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: From now on, you're not alone anymore, okay?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Man... Isn't that lovely?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Out of the myriad flavors in this land, the taste of reunion is the sweetest of them all.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Really, now... Dammit, what am I tearing up for...
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: That's the last of my worries settled.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Oh, right, that Judicial officer at the Forbidden City last night...
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Leizi...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: She was being held up by that Imperial Guard lady when she sent me flying out of the City.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What should we do now?
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: This isn't over quite yet...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I need to go and finish off what I should have done in the first place.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You... What are you planning to do?
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Demand an explanation... for everyone's sake.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: One hundred years it has been.
He returns once again, to where this game of weiqi started.
The board is covered in cobwebs and dust, a single black stone at the center.
He extends his hand to brush away the grime.
Where you off to?
attributes.name: Jiang

attributes.content: Got a meal to deliver.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: If you're going, then who's going to mind the restaurant?
attributes.name: Jiang

attributes.content: At this hour? It's past closing time.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Gonna open tomorrow?
attributes.name: Jiang

attributes.content: That depends on my mood tomorrow. Hard to say right now.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Why do I get the feeling that you want to call it quits?
attributes.name: Jiang

attributes.content: Fine by me, but you still owe me six months of wages. Settle that and I'll let you go.
attributes.name: Jiang

attributes.content: Tsch... You're so money-minded! How about all those staff meals I cooked for you, they must be worth a few months of debt...
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Fine, fine... On the right of the stove in the kitchen, the third brick from the corner. The last of my spare cash is under that brick. Take it.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: I've been with you for quite a few years now.
attributes.name: Jiang

attributes.content: Yep, fifteen whole years. You've stuck around the longest out of all your associates, Candleholder. Means we were really fated to be, haha.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: If I kept reminding myself that I was a Candleholder of the Sui Regulator, I'm afraid I wouldn't have stayed that long.
attributes.name: Jiang

attributes.content: *sigh* To be honest, it's been years since I reminded myself who I really am too.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Not like I was trying to remember or not, mind you. Whether as a man or beast, I've found this life full of delightful flavors. Nothing to complain about.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Best you keep not remembering.
attributes.name: Jiang

attributes.content: I fear if you do, you'll forget the tastes of man. Your palate will grow dull and numb, and your cooking skills will go to waste.
attributes.name: Jiang

attributes.content: *sigh*... Yeah, I wouldn't be too happy with that either.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: But if there's one thing I'll never forget, it's that my trouble-making brothers and sisters still need to eat.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Not to mention the one that's most troublesome of all... Though considering how long it's been since we last saw each other, it's hard to say what he's like now.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: You know the consequences of delivering this particular meal today, right?
attributes.name: Jiang

attributes.content: Uh... Yeah, more or less.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: It's obvious, like not keeping cotton by the stove. The Sui Regulator's not going to be happy if we have a family reunion.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Also, if a fight breaks out at such a delicate moment, you might not be seeing me tomorrow.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: *sigh*... I've made a lot of food and met a lot of people these past few years.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: My wish was for every customer who walks through those doors to have a tasty meal and a life with fewer regrets.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: The four flavors of the kitchen. The four emotions of the heart. Sorrowful partings and joyful reunions. They're not that much different.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: But just as fresh fins have their bones and maluses have no scent, this land is filled with regrets.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Eat when you're hungry, sleep when you're tired... and when you miss your family, maybe it's as simple as going to them.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Are... Are you really willing to let this go...
attributes.name: Jiang

attributes.content: There are a lot of things I don't want to let go of, but I can't hold onto them forever either.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Jiang... Mind looking after the shop for me while I'm gone?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: You've been watching me cook for so long, you must have picked something up by now. If any customers come by, look after them for me, will you?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: 'Savors at Yu's', the 'House of Aftertaste'... It ended up being a fitting name.
attributes.name: Yu

attributes.content: The mortal realm really lingers on the tongue.
attributes.name: Yu

attributes.content: Captain, my report. The Patrol Battalion has dispatched all their men, and sweep searches are underway in eight districts. Still no sign of the target.
attributes.name: Patrolling Soldier

attributes.content: It's been an entire day...
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Before day breaks, we must—
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Heard you were looking for me?
Who's there?!
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Out of the way.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What's this? Here to surrender?
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Good, you've saved me the effort of searching the entire city for you.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: I don't care if you want to take me in for what I did at the Feast or who I am... Now's not the time for it.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I've got urgent business, so best you move it.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hah...
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: I've never been this pissed off before. If you really want to get in my way, then come and try me.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: ...What are you going to do?
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: I'm here to deliver a bowl of longevity noodles to the True Lung.
attributes.name: Blaze
